Handling Severance of SC
The table below describes how to handle severing SC.
Stage
Who Is Responsible
Description
1
Rating Activity
Refers all ratings proposing severance of SC to a designated reviewer for approval or disapproval under
38 CFR 3.105(a)
.
2
Designated Reviewer
Is the rating approved?
If
yes
,
signs the rating, and
forwards the rating to authorization.
If
no
,
clearly marks the rating disapproved
signs the rating, and
returns the rating to the rating activity.
3
Rating Activity
Revises the rating, if required, to reflect the current evaluation of all service-connected (SC) disabilities, disposing of all other matters at issue
files the rating in the claims folder, and
returns the case to the designated reviewer (Step 2).
4
Authorization Activity
Processes the rating decision and adds a CUE flash in the Veterans Benefits Management System (VBMS).
Reference
:  For more information on approval of ratings prepared under
38 CFR 3.105(a)
, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 5.A.3.d
.
